title: Works fully with Warpcast
text:
• cast and reply via Composer Action
  • never leave the feed
  • Keccak256 in Actions search

title: Works with anonymous accounts
text:
• user may opt into casting as @superanon or @rawanon|@anoncast
  • anyone on internet can trigger pruning of old messages
  • (the nonce becomes a thronce)

title: Own your own data, protected by SIWF
text:
• see your most recent messages
  • download all your data
  • nonces ('number used once') for your safety and pleasure

title: User flow 100% permissionless, from soup to nuts
text:
• channel owners opt in/out via cast action
  • frame now emphasizes the encoded/decoded text, 'Show more' button added
  • QR Code to install Composer Action as a Recaster Mini-App

title: Released all components as FOSS under MIT license
text:
• Yoga GraphQL server, deployed on Cloudflare [GH].
  • Composer Action and Cast Action, deployed as Cloudflare Workers [GH].
  • Composer Action form (aka mini-app), deployed on Vercel [GH].
  • Private Frame, deployed on Vercel [GH]. (not part of SassyHash or Whistles Protocol, but adjacent)

title: v1.0.0: Protocol released to public
text:
• First cast in /bcbhshow [link]
  • Read+decode cast action released to the wild
  • GraphQL API shared with devs

title: Composer Action submitted to Warpcast for approval
text:
• Try it in Playground [link]
  • use testnet as nonce
